summary: "Hawaii Five-0" is an American TV series about a special police task force in Hawaii. It's a modern version of an older show, "Hawaii Five-O," which aired from 1968 to 1980. The new series started in 2010 and ended in 2020, with 240 episodes. It's set in the same fictional world as other shows created by Peter M. Lenkov, like "MacGyver" and "Magnum P.I." These shows sometimes had characters cross over into each other's stories. "Hawaii Five-0" also connected with the "NCIS" franchise through a special episode.
title: Hawaii Five-0 (2010 TV series)
